1631012318_1MieUGUUVUxVmvuLNGcTXt9wVBSqp.body: The only thing useful which came of that was the very specific Bill of Rights. Even today, the government has trouble exceeding those bounds. One need only look at what has happened to the Brits, Canadians, Australians to recognize what a tyrannical hell hole the US would be without that Bill of Rights.
